thread.title: Police attend collapse of close in Perth city centre
thread.title_full: Police attend collapse of close in Perth city centre

title: Police attend collapse of close in Perth city centre
text:
Police attend collapse of close in Perth city centre 29 March 2017 These are external links and will open in a new window Close share panel Image caption Emergency services were called to the scene shortly after 07:30 Emergency services have been attending the collapse of a close in Perth city centre. 
Atholl Street has been closed near the junction of North Methven Street, causing traffic congestion. 
Five fire engines including the heavy rescue unit are present as well as police, two ambulances and the Tayside trauma team. 
Scottish Fire and Rescue said a property had been evacuated due to the internal collapse of a close. Related Topics
